title: Kāmil al-sināʻah al-tibbīyah ... etc..
additional_titles: Blue and gold decoration [Inside front cover]|[Notes in Arabic, Samaritan, and Hebrew], f.1r|[Fragment of Hebrew commentary on Talmudic tractate on engagement for marriage], f. 12v|[Fragment of work on Jewish dietary norms], f. 13v|[Decorated notebook title page, ink], f. 14v|[Judeo-Arabic medical work], f. 15v|[Notes in Judeo-Arabic, Arabic, and roman letters], f. 19r|[Samaritan text], f. 21r|[Hebrew medical text], f. 25r|[Kāmil al-sināʻah al-tibbīyah], f. 40r
